attributes.action: take urgent steps to remove all of the uninsured vehicles that have been brought into the country by migrant workers  from our roads and crush them. Any migrant worker found to be driving an uninsured vehicle should have their right to stay removed and extradited immediately.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
